statements: SELECT * FROM bandwidth_usage_data
SELECT id, bytes_sent, bytes_received FROM bandwidth_usage_data
SELECT timestamp, bytes_sent FROM bandwidth_usage_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM bandwidth_usage_data WHERE bytes_received > 1000
SELECT id, timestamp FROM bandwidth_usage_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM bandwidth_usage_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY bytes_sent DESC
SELECT connection_id, SUM(bytes_sent) AS total_bytes_sent FROM bandwidth_usage_data GROUP BY connection_id HAVING total_bytes_sent > 10000
SELECT connection_id, AVG(bytes_received) AS avg_bytes_received FROM bandwidth_usage_data GROUP BY connection_id ORDER BY avg_bytes_received DESC
SELECT connection_id, MAX(bytes_received) AS max_bytes_received FROM bandwidth_usage_data GROUP BY connection_id ORDER BY max_bytes_received DESC
SELECT DISTINCT connection_id FROM bandwidth_usage_data
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, connection_date, bandwidth_usage FROM vpn_connections WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM vpn_connections WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY connection_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT id, connection_date, bandwidth_usage FROM vpn_connections WHERE bandwidth_usage > 1000;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS total_connections FROM vpn_connections GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_connections > 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email, bandwidth_usage FROM users INNER JOIN vpn_connections ON users.user_id = vpn_connections.user_id WHERE bandwidth_usage < 500;
SELECT * FROM VPN_Connections;
SELECT user_id, bandwidth_used, connection_time FROM VPN_Connections;
SELECT * FROM VPN_Users WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT MAX(bandwidth_used) AS max_bandwidth_used FROM VPN_Connections;
SELECT username, email FROM VPN_Users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM VPN_Users;
SELECT * FROM VPN_Connections WHERE bandwidth_used > 100;
SELECT username, registration_date FROM VPN_Users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT connection_id, connection_time FROM VPN_Connections WHERE connection_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT VPN_Users.username, VPN_Plans.plan_name, VPN_Plans.price FROM VPN_Users JOIN VPN_Plans ON VPN_Users.plan_id = VPN_Plans.plan_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT hostname, region FROM vpn_servers ORDER BY region ASC;
SELECT connection_time, bandwidth_usage FROM vpn_connections WHERE user_id = 123456;
SELECT log_time, log_message FROM vpn_logs WHERE vpn_connection_id = 789012 ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM vpn_connections ORDER BY connection_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_connections FROM vpn_connections;
SELECT username, email FROM users JOIN vpn_connections ON users.user_id = vpn_connections.user_id;
SELECT log_time, log_message FROM vpn_logs WHERE vpn_connection_id = 3 ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users
SELECT id, username, email FROM Users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM VPN_Servers
SELECT provider_name, establishment_year FROM VPN_Providers WHERE establishment_year > 2000
SELECT id, connection_name, status, start_time, end_time FROM Connections ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM Users WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;

SELECT Bandwidth_Usage_Data.user_id, Users.username, Users.email, AVG(upload_speed) AS avg_upload_speed FROM Bandwidth_Usage_Data JOIN Users ON Bandwidth_Usage_Data.user_id = Users.id GROUP BY Bandwidth_Usage_Data.user_id, Users.username, Users.email;
SELECT VPN_Servers.location, COUNT(*) AS server_count FROM VPN_Servers GROUP BY VPN_Servers.location HAVING server_count > 5 ORDER BY server_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_name, AVG(capacity) AS avg_capacity FROM VPN_Providers WHERE establishment_year > 2000 GROUP BY provider_name;
